text: Ni-Rabbow koo inkittoyseeh koh yuqunxeeh ku-Amri oggole Namma Num (Nabii Ibraahim kee kay baxa Nabii Ismaaqil kinnuk) nee Ab, Ni-Samadak (raddik) ummatay koo inkittossaah koh tuqunxeeh ku-Amri oggolta ummat tet Ab, ku-diinih madqooqii kee Cajji taamoomi elle Abna inna nee Barisaay nee uybulluy, toobat nek oggol, Diggah Atu isi Naqoosak toobat oggoltaah keenih Racmata Rabbi kinnitok iyyen
